howToGetIt: Obtain asylum in the United States by: - Filing for affirmative asylum if you are not in proceedings before the Executive Office for Immigration Review (EOIR); or - Filing for asylum defensively if you are in proceedings in front of an immigration judge or the Board of Immigration Appeals (BIA) at EOIR. If you fail to file Form I-589 within 1 year of your arrival in the United States, you may not be eligible to apply for asylum under section 208(a)(2)(B) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (INA).
